title: Tragedy of the Commons - fisheries example

content.prompt: Which of the following is the best illustration of the tragedy of the commons?

choices.label: Depletion of fishing stocks in the North Atlantic
Collective farming of wine grapes in communities in France
Using national forests for wood production and harvesting
Allocation of all nuclear wastes to one site in Nevada
Agreements among western ranchers to jointly manage common grazing land

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain environmental concepts and processes.
